best_practices.title: Lead by Example
best_practices.description: Take the course and get certified yourself. Show students and staff the importance by completing it yourself. Schools report higher completion rates when directors and leaders complete the certification first.

best_practices.title: Make it Required
best_practices.description: Don't make it optional! Integrate courses into daily classroom lessons or assign as homework. Making it required emphasizes the importance of this content and certification.

best_practices.title: Maximize Downtime
best_practices.description: Offer courses as a way to fill downtime. Post instructions in breakrooms or study areas so students have no excuses for not knowing how to take the courses.
